Text:
I'm busy with an app that sends an Sms to a number selected from the users phone contact list. I've got as far as opening up the contact list but the moment I select a contact, the app crashes and tells me "Column number does not exist".

     public void onActivityResult(int ReqCode, int ResCode, Intent Data)
        {
            super.onActivityResult(ReqCode, ResCode, Data);
            switch(ReqCode)
            {
                case(PICK_CONTACT) :
                    if (ResCode == Activity.RESULT_OK)
                    {
                        Uri ConNum = Data.getData();
                        Cursor C = getContentResolver().query(ConNum,null,null,null,null);
                        if(C.moveToFirst())
                        {
                            String Num = C.getString(C.getColumnIndexOrThrow(Contacts.People.NUMBER));
                        }
                    }
                    break;
            }
        }

The Application crashes on the String Num line.

This method is called using an intent in an OnClickListener

    Intent I = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_PICK);
                    I.setType(ContactsContract.Contacts.CONTENT_TYPE);
                    startActivityForResult(I,PICK_CONTACT);

The PICK_CONTACT variable is instantiated at class level

    final int PICK_CONTACT = 1;

Here is the logcat file 

    09-07 10:06:39.809 5473-5473/com.example.damon.mapassgnment2 E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
                                                                                   Process: com.example.damon.mapassgnment2, PID: 5473
                                                                                   java.lang.RuntimeException: Failure delivering result ResultInfo{who=null, request=1, result=-1, data=Intent { dat=content://com.android.contacts/contacts/lookup/3191i8DoIiFxv2EiHcWTcf71AIgAAAAABDvA6CIhcb9hIh3Fk3H-9QCIAAAAAFQI1/243 }} to activity {com.example.damon.mapassgnment2/com.example.damon.mapassgnment2.MapsActivity}: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: column 'number' does not exist
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.deliverResults(ActivityThread.java:3798)
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.handleSendResult(ActivityThread.java:3841)
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.access$1400(ActivityThread.java:154)
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:1440)
                                                                                       at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:102)
                                                                                       at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:234)
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:5526)
                                                                                       at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
                                                                                       at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(ZygoteInit.java:726)
                                                                                       at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:616)
                                                                                    Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: column 'number' does not exist
                                                                                       at android.database.AbstractCursor.getColumnIndexOrThrow(AbstractCursor.java:333)
                                                                                       at android.database.CursorWrapper.getColumnIndexOrThrow(CursorWrapper.java:87)
                                                                                       at com.example.damon.mapassgnment2.MapsActivity.onActivityResult(MapsActivity.java:180)
                                                                                       at android.app.Activity.dispatchActivityResult(Activity.java:6490)
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.deliverResults(ActivityThread.java:3794)
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.handleSendResult(ActivityThread.java:3841) 
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.access$1400(ActivityThread.java:154) 
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:1440) 
                                                                                       at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:102) 
                                                                                       at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:234) 
                                                                                       at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:5526) 
                                                                                       at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method) 
                                                                                       at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(ZygoteInit.java:726) 
                                                                                       at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:616) 
    09-07 10:06:41.546 5473-5473/com.example.damon.mapassgnment2 I/Process: Sending signal. PID: 5473 SIG: 9
